title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.29 - Audit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.29 - Audit

State Regulations
(a) The examination
of contracts, orders and other original documents for the purpose of
substantiating individual transactions before their settlement. (b) Any systematic investigation or appraisal
of procedures or operations for the purpose of determining conformity with
prescribed criteria; the work performed by an internal auditor. (c) Auditing. An exploratory, critical
review, by a public accountant, of the underlying internal controls and
accounting records of a business enterprise or other economic unit, precedent
to the expression by him of an opinion of the propriety ("fairness") of its
financial statements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
